TENTATIVE AGENDA
Pago E
Identification of primary target of public relations efforts,
and establishment of objectives,
a) Present public relations programs of
each organisation.
b) What should be over-all objectives of
a joint public relations effort?
c) Methods of improving public relations
through joint efforts.
Formation of working committees to be based on various media
or various problems.
Thursday, February 16 - 6g00 P.M.
Ccrasnittee meetings.
Friday, February 17 - 9|30 A.M.
Heport of committees.
